products.name: Great Grains Cereal Raisins, Dates, & Pecans
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Breakfasts, Cereals and potatoes, Seeds, Cereals and their products, Breakfast cereals, Cereal grains, Avena, en:crunchy-cereal-clusters
products.facts: ["Great Grains Cereal Raisins, Dates, & Pecans is made with whole grain wheat as its primary ingredient, providing essential nutrients.","The cereal contains real raisins, dates, and pecans, contributing to its natural sweetness and flavor without artificial additives.","The packaging is designed to be recyclable, promoting environmentally friendly disposal practices.","This cereal is a good source of fiber, which supports digestive health and helps maintain a balanced diet."]

products.name: Caper berries in brine
products.facts: ["Caper berries are the immature fruit of the caper bush, scientifically known as Capparis spinosa.","They are typically preserved in brine, which enhances their flavor and extends shelf life.","Caper bushes thrive in Mediterranean climates, requiring well-drained soil and full sun exposure.","High-quality caper berries are hand-harvested, ensuring a more delicate and flavorful product."]

products.name: Quaker apple & blueberry flavour hot oat cereal
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Flakes, Rolled flakes, Quick oats, en:cereal-flakes
products.facts: ["Made with whole grain oats for a nutritious breakfast option.","Contains real apple and blueberry pieces for natural flavor.","Packaged in a recyclable material to support eco-friendly practices.","No artificial flavors or preservatives, ensuring high quality and taste."]

products.name: HP Honey BBQ Sauce imp
products.facts: ["HP Honey BBQ Sauce is packaged in a 400ml recyclable bottle.","The sauce contains natural ingredients including honey and tomatoes.","HP sources its ingredients responsibly, aiming for sustainable practices.","The product is gluten-free, catering to a wider range of dietary needs."]

products.name: Finest Pesto With Fresh Basil
products.facts: ["Made with fresh basil, high-quality olive oil, pine nuts, garlic, and Parmesan cheese.","Uses sustainably sourced ingredients to minimize environmental impact.","Produced in small batches to ensure quality and freshness.","Free from artificial preservatives and additives, focusing on natural flavors."]

products.name: Chocolate con leche con almendras
products.categories: Snacks,Sweet snacks,Cocoa and its products,Chocolates,Milk chocolates,Chocolates with almonds,Chocolates with hazelnuts,Milk chocolates with almonds
products.facts: ["Made with high-quality milk chocolate and roasted almonds.","Contains no artificial flavors or preservatives.","Packaging is recyclable to reduce environmental impact.","Sourced from sustainable cocoa farms to support eco-friendly practices."]

products.name: Peanut Butter Chocolate
products.categories: Snacks, Sweet snacks, Bars, Dietary supplements, Bodybuilding supplements, Energy bars, Protein bars
products.facts: ["Contains high-quality ingredients including cocoa and peanuts.","Made with sustainably sourced cocoa to support eco-friendly practices.","Packaged in recyclable materials to minimize environmental impact.","Free from artificial preservatives and additives, ensuring natural quality."]

products.name: Healthy Multi-Grain Bread
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Breads
products.facts: ["Made with a blend of whole grains such as oats, barley, and millet for added fiber and nutrients.","Often contains seeds like flaxseed or sunflower seeds, which provide healthy fats and protein.","Typically produced with minimal processing to retain the natural benefits of the grains.","Many brands focus on sustainable sourcing of grains, promoting ecological farming practices."]
